metadata.title: CVE-2024-5458 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In PHP versions 8.1.* before 8.1.29, 8.2.* before 8.2.20, 8.3.* before8.3.8, due to a code logic error, filtering functions such as filter_varwhen validating URLs (FILTER_VALIDATE_URL) for certain types of URLs thefunction will result in invalid user information (username + password partof URLs) being treated as valid user information. This may lead to thedownstream code accepting invalid URLs as valid and parsing themincorrectly.

criterions.comment: php7.2 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
